Katie Price is reportedly terrified her ex lover Charles Drury will leak intimate footage of her taken during their fling.

The model and businesswoman left her fiancé Kris Boyson for Charles, but has now ditched Charles to go back to Kris, leaving the builder heartbroken.

And now Katie fears she will become the victim of revenge porn as Charles lashes out at her for their split.

The pair enjoyed a booze-fuelled holiday in Turkey together and their partying reportedly led to private photos and videos being taken.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

(Image: Facebook)

A source told The Sun Online: “They shared a really wild and passionate relationship which only lasted a few weeks but it was when Katie was out of control. She’d had a lot of surgery and wasn’t looking after herself.

“A lot of the time she was drunk and she was partying and lets just say her and Charlie had a lot of fun together.

"Charles has got a phone full of pictures and videos and Katie knows that people want to know everything about their relationship."

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

They added: "Charles was obviously really devastated by the split, but ultimately he's a decent guy and wouldn't betray Katie's trust.

"But that doesn't stop her worrying about it.

"Katie knows things didn’t end well with Charles. She went back with her ex Kris when her and Charles were meant to be together which majorly p***ed him off."

Charles has been flirting again with Katie on social media despite going back to Kris and being pictured sneaking out of his house recently.

(Image: Instagram)

She posted an old picture of herself on a book tour and said: "Major throwback! What cities shall Pricey visit next? comment below & I may just see you very soon".

Charles took to the comment section to suggest "Nottingham" adding a winking emoji for good measure.

Plus, at the time of writing, Katie and Charles still follow each other on Instagram .

MirrorOnline has contacted Katie's rep for comment.
description: Katie Price is reportedly worried her scorned ex Charles Drury will post intimate photos and videos from their fling
